alert.note: Alert for White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 5:27AM AKST until November 28 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Visibility one half mile or less in blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will decrease by noon today, and blowing snow will become less severe.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
